title: Anyone know whats going on with Ezreal?
body: So is he getting a buff or adjust to go back to being an ADC? I'm only asking cause I've mained him for more than 4 years now. I don't really want him to have new skills or anything, but I do understand how bad he is as an adc right now.

replies.body: Hmm, I really wonder if he will get a crit on his Q. In the current meta isn't that a viable thing to imply?
Ezreal can't compete with the meta champ that does crit dmg ....... he is so outclass due to his kit ( skillshot etc) unless riot buff him so that his q can crit then he might be viable i guess

Ez won't catch a buff because he's strong in the jungle atm, but he won't be strong(as adc) until atkS/crit adc are no longer meta 

And we won't know how that will goes until preseason.
